Text: MetrixND Version Dear MetrixND Users Based on the results of our recent user survey regarding what Windows platforms you are using we have decided to eliminate testing and support of MetrixND version on Windows The small fraction of you that are currently running a Windows environment will need to upgrade to at least Windows to run MetrixND version RER will still support previous versions of MetrixND that run on Windows however we encourage all users to run the most current version MetrixND version will be tested on the following platforms Windows Windows Windows NT version or higher Windows ME Windows XP If you have any questions please contact Frank Monforte or me Shannon Ashburn Regional Economic Research Inc RER El Camino Real San Diego CA fax
MetrixND NewsletterPST Happy Holidays from RER Shannon Ashburn Marketing Administrator RER MetrixNDNewsletterDecpdf
